For each type of tree explained in this App, the following information is available:â A photo (if applicable)â The Scientific Nameâ The Common Nameâ The Kingdom, Phylum, Clade, Order, Family, Subfamily, Genusâ Biological informationâ Other informationThese 1000 different trees were grouped into around 90 different sub-categories for easier referencing. It is probably the most complete and comprehensive Encyclopedia of Trees available in the App Market. This App is an excellent app for students and botanical experts, or anyone who is interested in understanding more about the amazing trees around us.âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECT This application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with preview of each tree- All Category View to preview all trees in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list trees of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected trees for easier reference- Cross-referencing LINKS to other trees- A tree name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsing The application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.ââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.
